sect1.title: cvs update/up
sect1.para: cvs update or cvs up. This command syncs your local sandbox with the server and is probably, along with cvs commit the command you will use most frequently. If you have made local changes, it'll try and merge any changes on the server with your changes on your machine. You should always do a manual cvs update before trying to commit changes in order to check that everything is alright and ready to go (although when you do a cvs commit, it will warn you if there is a problem).
